extensionName.message: GoAlias - Smart Alias Manager with AI Search

extensionDescription.message: Transforms the address bar into an intelligent navigation system with aliases, AI, and fuzzy search.

popupTitleSavePage.description: Title of the popup when saving a new page.

popupTitleEditAlias.description: Title of the popup when editing an existing alias. %s is the alias name.

labelURL.description: Label for the URL input field.

labelAlias.description: Label for the Alias input field.

placeholderAlias.description: Placeholder for the Alias input field.

errorAliasEmpty.description: Error message when alias is empty.

errorAliasInvalidChars.message: Alias can only contain Latin letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
errorAliasInvalidChars.description: Error message when alias has invalid characters.

labelKeywords.description: Label for the Keywords input field.

placeholderKeywords.description: Placeholder for the Keywords input field.

buttonGenerateAI.description: Button text to generate AI keywords.

buttonGenerating.description: Button text while AI is generating.

buttonManageAliases.description: Button text to open alias management page.

statusGeneratingAI.message: Generating alias and keywords with AI...

statusAIReady.message: Alias and keywords generated by AI!
statusAIReady.description: Status message after successful AI generation.

statusAIError.message: AI error: %s. Enter alias and keywords manually.
statusAIError.description: Status message on AI generation error. %s is the error message.

statusCriticalError.description: Generic critical error message. %s is the error message.

statusErrorURL.description: Error message when URL is empty.

statusAliasSaved.description: Status message after successful alias save. %s is the alias name.

statusSaveError.description: Status message on alias save error. %s is the error message.

statusUnexpectedError.description: Generic unexpected error message. %s is the error message.

statusAliasExists.description: Error message when alias name is taken. %s is the alias name.

statusAliasUpdated.description: Status message after successful alias update. %s is the alias name.

statusUpdateError.description: Status message on alias update error. %s is the error message.

statusAliasDeleted.description: Status message after successful alias deletion. %s is the alias name.

statusDeleteError.description: Status message on alias delete error. %s is the error message.

statusNoAliasToDelete.description: Status message when trying to delete non-existent alias.

statusPageSavedAs.message: Page already saved as "%s". You can update or delete.
statusPageSavedAs.description: Status message if page is already saved. %s is the alias name.

statusEnterAliasOrGenerate.description: Initial status message in popup for new page.

placeholderFilter.description: Placeholder for the filter input on options page.

buttonGenerateAllAIKeywords.description: Button to generate AI keywords for all synced bookmarks.

buttonExportJSON.description: Button to export aliases to JSON.

buttonImportJSON.description: Button to import aliases from JSON.

buttonDeleteAll.description: Button to delete all aliases from the extension.

buttonDeleteFolders.description: Button to toggle folder deletion mode.

buttonDeleteModeActive.description: Button text when folder deletion mode is active.

totalAliases.description: Total number of aliases. %s is the count.

statsTotalLaunches.description: Label for total Omnibox launches statistic.

statsDirectAlias.description: Label for direct alias launches statistic.

statsFuzzySearch.description: Label for fuzzy search launches statistic.

statsAISearch.description: Label for AI search launches statistic.

statsGoogleFallback.description: Label for Google fallback launches statistic.

loadingAliases.description: Message displayed while aliases are loading.

noAliasesFound.description: Message displayed when no aliases are found.

noAliasesFilter.message: No aliases found for your query or selected folder.
noAliasesFilter.description: Message displayed when filter/search yields no results.

editAliasTitle.description: Title of the alias edit dialog.

labelTags.description: Label for the Tags input field.

labelSource.description: Label for the Source input field.

labelBookmarkPath.description: Label for the Bookmark Path input field.

buttonSaveDialog.description: Button text to save changes in dialog.

confirmDeleteAlias.message: Are you sure you want to delete alias "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteAlias.description: Confirmation message for deleting a single alias. %s is the alias name.

confirmDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete ALL aliases from folder "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteFolder.description: Confirmation message for deleting all aliases in a folder. %s is the folder path.

confirmDeleteAllAIKeywords.message: This action can take a long time and use significant resources as AI will generate keywords for ALL your bookmarks. Continue?
confirmDeleteAllAIKeywords.description: Confirmation message for generating AI keywords for all bookmarks.

confirmDeleteAllAliases.message: WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete ABSOLUTELY ALL aliases, including manually created ones? This action cannot be undone!
confirmDeleteAllAliases.description: Confirmation message for deleting ALL aliases.

statusSyncingBookmarks.message: Syncing bookmarks... this may take a while.

statusSyncComplete.message: Sync complete: added %s1, updated %s2, skipped %s3 aliases.

statusSyncError.description: Status message on bookmark sync error. %s is the error message.

statusGeneratingAIKeywordsBulk.message: Generating AI keywords for all bookmarks... Please do not close the page.
statusGeneratingAIKeywordsBulk.description: Status message during bulk AI keyword generation.

statusAIKeywordsGenerated.message: AI keywords generated: added %s1, updated %s2, skipped %s3 aliases.
statusAIKeywordsGenerated.description: Status message after bulk AI keyword generation. %s1=added, %s2=updated, %s3=skipped.

statusAIKeywordsError.description: Status message on bulk AI keyword generation error. %s is the error message.

statusDeletingFolderAliases.description: Status message during deletion of folder aliases. %s is the folder path.

statusFolderAliasesDeleted.description: Status message after deleting folder aliases. %s1=count, %s2=folder path.

statusDeleteFolderError.description: Status message on folder aliases deletion error. %s is the error message.

statusDeletingAllAliases.description: Status message during deletion of all aliases.

statusAllAliasesDeleted.description: Status message after deleting all aliases.

statusDeleteAllError.description: Status message on deletion of all aliases error. %s is the error message.

statusImportError.description: Status message on import error. %s is the error message.
